name: Deep Clean 2069
description:
Play as a Janitor and an Engineering Intern while they try to keep the engineering bay of a starship functioning after the rest of the engineering staff met their untimely demise.

Follow commands from the officers on the bridge to defeat the mighty Fuy  Gieri and live to see another day!  Just remember, you need to keep your workspace clean if you want to keep your jobs.

-----------------------------------

Deep Clean 2069 is a cooperative 2 person game where you both play on the same keyboard.  It's possible to play and even win by yourself, but it's  very difficult.  Playing with a friend is recommended!

Adriel Claflin - Art & Animation Alberto Del Rio - Audio Recording Alieha Dryden - Character Art  & Script Chris Dahrens - Development & Art John Kiser - Composer & Sound Design Matt Morris - Development
